attributes.action: Ban Road Tax and Put an extra 10p on fuel. have an insurance disc displayed instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would ensure all users of our roads contribute towards the upkeep, the foreign vehicles and 'DP' plated cars would also have to pay for using the roads. By having an insurance disc all cars would be required to be insured, cars not displaying a valid insurance disc could be impounded, sold or destroyed.
